column4: hello, guys, I have a problem with sound on ubuntu, when I login using the first created user sound works, when I login using another user everything works except sound! Any one can help ?
add the second user to the sound group
there is no list, but generally speaking -- admin (this group is allowed to sudo -- run tasks with root privileges) sanner (use of scanners), audio (use sound card), games (play games), etc.
